title: Crime Fiction: Murder: Hope and Justice (Noir Mystery Suspense Amateur Sleuths Police Procedurals)
description: Hope and justice is about a detective George, mid age frustrated from a divorce that left him without everything in terms of family and stability. He is portrayed as an alcoholic, worn out detective who has given up with life, and lives to do just enough to get him a paycheck.He no longer has passion for the career he chose, and is seen admitting to it, and is further evidenced by the manner he gets contented with sufficient evidence, in place of following up on his juniors hunches which turned out to be informative.George is confronted by a case that he had an initially refused, the dead body of a woman is found in the boot of a car at the beach. This sees him go through a couple of hurdles to crack the case, and even put the dead woman spouse in custody as the main suspect.He seems to have all the cards in place, when the junior detective stumbles upon some evidence that places the man in custody as innocent, in a wild twist of events.
author: Vicki R. Pond
